xs.$description: 12px at 14px base (0.857rem at 16px base). For captions, labels, badges, counters inside buttons.

sm.$description: 14px at 16px base (1rem at 14px base). Base size for application UI. For body text, buttons, inputs.

base.$description: 14px at 14px base (16px at 16px base). Base body text size. Adapts to context base font size.

md.$description: 16px at 14px base (18px at 16px base). Slightly larger body text, emphasized content.

lg.$description: 17.5px at 14px base (20px at 16px base). Large body text, subheadings.

xl.$description: 21px at 14px base (24px at 16px base). Heading level 6, card titles.

2xl.$description: 26.25px at 14px base (30px at 16px base). Heading level 5.

3xl.$description: 31.5px at 14px base (36px at 16px base). Heading level 4.

4xl.$description: 42px at 14px base (48px at 16px base). Heading level 3.

5xl.$description: 52.5px at 14px base (60px at 16px base). Heading level 2.

6xl.$description: 63px at 14px base (72px at 16px base). Heading level 1, hero text.
